Posts.EditableText: I finally got the video of me shooting "Crackhead Jack" in the nads with the 8 ball from the pool table. (He agreed to this for 7 bucks). If you want to watch it go to my myspace and check out the video under videos: http://www.myspace.com/drfroth Thanks, Dr. Froth
